dcterms:description: A non-synthetic dataset consisting of mmWave radar-based gait biometric data collected from 10 volunteers across four different locations over multiple days, allowing for the study of spatial and temporal domain shifts in gait recognition.
dcterms:title: mmWave radar-based gait biometric dataset
